title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.38 - Traffic direction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.38 - Traffic direction

State Regulations

No vehicle shall be operated, backed, pushed or otherwise
caused to move in a direction which is against the normal flow of traffic on
any travel lane, shoulder or other roadway within the parkway
system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.38

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
